verses.name: Ephesians 4:1
verses.text: I therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,

verses.name: Ephesians 4:2
verses.text: With all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;

verses.name: Ephesians 4:3
verses.text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.

verses.name: Ephesians 4:4
verses.text: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;

verses.name: Ephesians 4:5
verses.text: One Lord, one faith, one baptism,

verses.name: Ephesians 4:6
verses.text: One God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.
